name: Wave Shielder
description:
VR only, for Oculus headsets. (Tested on Rift version 1 and Windows 10.)

Attack drones have invaded your base! And you're cornered in an empty hangar with no cover and no ammo. Luckily, you have a shield that can absorb their energy blasts -- but only if you time it right. Use it to charge up your weapons and survive through the onslaught.

How to play / controls:

  • left thumbstick to move, right thumbstick has comfort turning, no teleport in the jam build
  • triggers on each hand to fire each blaster (if you have ammo charged up)
  • grip buttons on each hand for shielding (0.2 second window for absorption, you can't shoot while shielding same hand)
  • you can get hit 3 times before dying
  • 'A' button to restart (right hand controller, lower thumb button)
  • escape key to quit

Built in 3 days for Ludum Dare 45. The theme was "Start With Nothing". This is the jam build, which means it's incomplete in a lot of ways.
